description: This sequence depicts a figure's unusual attempts at hunting birds. Initially, the hunter attempts to attract birds by manifesting numerous limbs and waving them frantically, causing distress when this fails. Following this bizarre display, the hunter resorts to an even more unconventional method, using a mallet to strike a bow before awkwardly shooting an arrow downwards. Surprisingly, this absurd technique proves successful, resulting in a fallen bird. The narrative highlights the surreal transformation of the hunter's body and the ironic success of illogical actions.
